summary: The Bureau of Indian Affairs reviews and approves applications for several types of real estate transactions, including mortgages, for Tribes and their citizens on certain lands. BIA has deadlines for these services in federal regulations and internal policies, but it inconsistently met these deadlines. For example, after receiving a complete application for a certain type of mortgage, BIA is required to approve or disapprove it...
title: Tribal Issues: Bureau of Indian Affairs Should Take Additional Steps to Improve Timely Delivery of Real Estate Services
